import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { KTSVG } from "../../../../_metronic/helpers"; import { PageTitle } from "../../../../_metronic/layout/core"; import { authActions, selectCurrentUser } from "../../../redux-module/auth/authSlice"; import PopupCapNhatYeuCauLienKetDS from "../popup/PopupCapNhatYeuCauLienKetDS"; import axios from "axios"; import moment from "moment"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import LoadingIndicator from "../../../components/LoadingIndicator"; import api from "../../../configs/api"; import { HinhThuc, TrangThaiLienKetDuocSi } from "../../../data"; import { BangCap } from "../duoc-si/bang-cap/BangCap"; import { LichSuChungChi } from "../duoc-si/lich-su-chung-chi/LichSuChungChi"; import { LichSuDaoTao } from "../duoc-si/lich-su-dao-tao/LichSuDaoTao"; import { LichSuThucHanh } from "../duoc-si/lich-su-thuc-hanh/LichSuThucHanh"; import { commonActions, selectIsLastLogin } from "../../../redux-module/common/commonSlice"; export function ChungChiHanhNgheDuoc() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const currentUser = useSelector(selectCurrentUser); const isLastLogin = useSelector(selectIsLastLogin) const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); const [showModalYCLK, setShowModalYCLK] = useState(false); const [ThongTinChungChi, setThongTinChungChi] = useState(null); const closeModalCapNhatYeuCauLK = () => setShowModalYCLK(false); const showModalCapNhatYeuCauLK = () => setShowModalYCLK(true); useEffect(() => { getChungChiUser(); }, []); useEffect(() => { if (currentUser.last_login === null) { if (isLastLogin === false) { setShowModalYCLK(true); dispatch(commonActions.setIsLastLogin(true)); } else if (isLastLogin === true) { setShowModalYCLK(false); } } }, [currentUser]) const getChungChiUser = async () => { await setIsLoading(true); axios .get(api.API_THONG_TIN_LIEN_KET_DUOC_SI) .then(({ data }) => { setThongTinChungChi(data?.results); }) .catch(() => { }) .finally(() => { setIsLoading(false); }); }; const usersBreadcrumbs = [ { title: "Trang chá»§", path: "/", isSeparator: false, isActive: false, }, { title: "", path: "", isSeparator: true, isActive: false, }, ]; const checkHinhThuc = (id) => { let hinhThuc = HinhThuc.find((e) => e.id === id); return {hinhThuc.name}; } const checkStatus = (id) => { let status = TrangThaiLienKetDuocSi.find((e) => e.id === id); return {status.name}; }; return ( <>
